name: Allgemeine Ortskrankenkasse-Bundesverband
goal: Vertretung der Interessen der elf regionalen AOK Krankenkassen; Beratung der EU-Institutionen in allen Fragen der gesetzlichen Krankenversicherung.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Medizinprodukte-Verordnung
Arzneimittel - EMA
eHealth und Big Data
Health Technology Assessment
Health Literacy
Healthy Aging
Europäisches Semester
Grenzüberschreitender Versorgung
